Package grafiosch.repository

Class ProposeChangeEntityJpaRepositoryImpl

java.lang.Object
grafiosch.repository.BaseRepositoryImpl<ProposeChangeEntity>
grafiosch.repository.ProposeRequestService<ProposeChangeEntity>
grafiosch.repository.ProposeChangeEntityJpaRepositoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
BaseRepositoryCustom<ProposeChangeEntity>, ProposeChangeEntityJpaRepositoryCustom
public class ProposeChangeEntityJpaRepositoryImpl extends ProposeRequestService<ProposeChangeEntity> implements ProposeChangeEntityJpaRepositoryCustom
Implementation of custom repository operations for managing entity change proposals. This repository handles the workflow of processing change requests for shared entities, including privilege-based access control, entity state comparison, and proposal lifecycle management.
The implementation provides functionality for:
- Retrieving open proposals based on user access privileges
- Creating comparison views between current and proposed entity states
- Cleaning up orphaned proposals where target entities no longer exist
- Dynamic entity class resolution from proposal metadata
Access control ensures that users with higher privileges can review all proposals, while regular users can only access proposals for entities they own.

    • saveOnlyAttributes

      @Transactional @Modifying public ProposeChangeEntity saveOnlyAttributes(ProposeChangeEntity proposeChangeEntity, ProposeChangeEntity existingEntity, Set<Class<? extends Annotation>> updatePropertyLevelClasses)
      Description copied from interface: BaseRepositoryCustom
      Saves only specific attributes of an entity based on property-level update permissions. Uses annotation-based access control to determine which fields can be modified by the current user.
      Specified by:
      saveOnlyAttributes in interface BaseRepositoryCustom<ProposeChangeEntity>
      Parameters:
      proposeChangeEntity - the entity containing the new values to be saved
      existingEntity - the current entity from the database, null for new entities
      updatePropertyLevelClasses - set of annotation classes that define update permission levels
      Returns:
      the saved entity with updated attributes

    • getProposeChangeEntityWithEntity

      public List<ProposeChangeEntityWithEntity> getProposeChangeEntityWithEntity() throws Exception
      Description copied from interface: ProposeChangeEntityJpaRepositoryCustom
      Retrieves all pending entity change proposals with their corresponding current and proposed entity states. This method creates a comprehensive view for administrators to review proposed changes by:
      - Fetching all open change proposals based on user privileges
      - Loading the current state of each affected entity
      - Applying proposed changes to create the modified entity version
      - Cleaning up orphaned proposals where the target entity no longer exists
      The returned data structure contains three components for each proposal: the original proposal request, the current entity state, and the entity state with proposed changes applied, enabling side-by-side comparison.
      Access control is applied based on the current user's role:
      - Users with higher privileges see all pending proposals
      - Regular users only see proposals for entities they own
      Specified by:
      getProposeChangeEntityWithEntity in interface ProposeChangeEntityJpaRepositoryCustom
      Returns:
      list of proposal containers with current and proposed entity states
      Throws:
      Exception - if entity class resolution fails or proposal processing encounters errors
